**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 60

Explore the cursed jungles, blood-soaked swamps, and radioactive cavern-worlds of [Zevgavizeb's](/Deities.aspx?ID=82) [Abyssal](/Planes.aspx?ID=13) realm.
